.options, wrap: false, toRegex: true, strictZeros: true });

	      if (range.length !== 0) {
	        return args.length > 1 && range.length > 1 ? `(${range})` : range;
	      }
	    }

	    if (node.nodes) {
	      for (const child of node.nodes) {
	        output += walk(child, node);
	      }
	    }

	    return output;
	  };

	  return walk(ast);
	};

	compile_1 = compile;
	return compile_1;
}

	const utils = /*@__PURE__*/ requireUtils();

	  const result = [];

	  queue = [].concat(queue);
	  stash = [].concat(stash);

	  if (!stas
